column5: I will not be myself then. I think this is why pain doesn't just go away at an instant. It fades slowly.
I get it mate, trust me.
I know this is hard but we don't have any control over our reactions and even if we did, we don't require to pretend. Have a nice day ✨

I understand what you are feeling right now, trust me I feel the same sometimes. But giving it time is all you can do buddy. I know it must be hard but you can do that, I believe in you. I hope you'll believe in yourself too. Hugs.
A "hug" who doesn't want it. I've seen people hugging eachother casually but you my friend you don't need that casualty. So, just get up take a pillow and curl yourself like a tiny ball.❣️
